text: Implemented in Tomcat 8 by r1539953 and will be in 8.0.0-RC6

markt@apache.org
text:
Back-ported to 7.0.x for 7.0.48 onwards.

Proposed for 6.0.x.
I just wanted to use tomcat 8.0.0-RC10 via maven but org.eclipse.jdt.core.compiler:ecj:jar:4.3.1 could not be resolved. It seems not to be available in public maven repos...
creator: martin.grotzke@googlemail.com
ralphschaer@yahoo.com
text:
ecj 4.3.1 is now on the central maven repository.

It took a while. I uploaded the bundle to sonatype in december and today it got finally approved.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: 6.0.x has been updated to ECJ 4.3.1 which will be included in 6.0.38 onwards.
